scripts.build:local: echo '🔨 Building Docker image posey-postgres:latest...' && docker build --no-cache -t posey-postgres:latest . && docker images posey-postgres:latest
scripts.k8s:check: kubectl cluster-info > /dev/null 2>&1 || (echo 'Error: Kubernetes cluster not accessible. Please ensure:'; echo '1. Kubernetes is running (minikube, kind, etc.)'; echo '2. kubectl is configured correctly'; echo '3. Your VPN is connected if using a remote cluster'; exit 1)
scripts.deploy:local: yarn build:local && yarn k8s:check && kubectl apply -f k8s/namespace.yaml && mkdir -p k8s/local && cp k8s/postgres-statefulset-local.yaml k8s/local/ && cp k8s/postgres-secret.yaml k8s/local/ && cp k8s/postgres-configmap.yaml k8s/local/ && cp k8s/postgres-storage.yaml k8s/local/ && cp k8s/postgres-service.yaml k8s/local/ && kubectl delete statefulset postgres -n posey --ignore-not-found && kubectl delete pvc postgres-storage-postgres-0 -n posey --ignore-not-found && kubectl apply -k k8s/local
scripts.verify: kubectl get pods -n posey -l app=postgres && kubectl get services -n posey -l app=postgres
scripts.debug: echo '🔍 Checking Docker images:' && docker images | grep postgres && echo '🔍 Checking StatefulSet:' && kubectl get statefulset -n posey && echo '🔍 Checking Kubernetes pods:' && kubectl get pods -n posey -o wide && echo '🔍 Checking pod details:' && kubectl describe pod -n posey -l app=postgres || echo 'No pods found' && echo '🔍 Checking PVC status:' && kubectl get pvc -n posey && echo '🔍 Checking Kubernetes events:' && kubectl get events -n posey --sort-by=.metadata.creationTimestamp | tail -n 15
scripts.connect:
echo "Connection string (using dev proxy): postgresql://pocketdb:BNI_HGgs6F33IUY4BUN0Z@localhost:3333/posey"
echo "Connection string (direct NodePort): postgresql://pocketdb:BNI_HGgs6F33IUY4BUN0Z@localhost:30333/posey"
scripts.db:reset: yarn k8s:check && echo '🔄 Resetting all databases in PostgreSQL...' && bash scripts/reset_k8s_databases.sh
